generated_description: camozzi automation pneumatik is a company that specializes in the distribution and trading of pneumatic valves, cylinders, fittings, and accessories. they offer a range of products including pneatic cylinders, valves, frl units, filters, oilers, activated carbon filters, rapid screw fittings and couplings, vacuum, electric drives, c-fluid control, accessories, and spare parts. the company provides consultation services for the design and production of pneumatic systems and solutions, as well as the procurement of spare parts for camozzii pneumatics single components. they also offer a variety of pneumatic drives, including standard and non-standard cylinders, rotary cylinders, rodless cylinders, proximity switches, and additional cylinders accessories. additionally, they provide electromechanical cylinders, motors, handling and vacuum equipment, and solenoid valves.
